original_text: Now Jephthah the Gileadite was a mighty man of valour, and he was the son of an harlot: and Gilead begat Jephthah.
korean_text: 길르앗 사람 입다는 큰 용사였으니 기생이 길르앗에게서 낳은 아들이었고

sentences.original_text: Now Jephthah the Gileadite was a mighty man of valour
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 길르앗 사람 입다는 용맹한 장사였더니

sentences.original_text: and he was the son of an harlot
